DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy botulinum toxin Type A compare placebo treatment forehead line ( facial rhytides ) also administer frown line ( glabellar rhytides ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Treatment Forehead Frown Lines
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe forehead line Current previous botulinum toxin treatment serotype within one year Diagnosis myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis Prior facial cosmetic surgery ( e.g . prior periorbital surgery , facial lift , brow lift , eyelid lift eyebrow surgery ) Facial laser light treatment , microdermabrasion , superficial peel within 3 month Oral retinoid therapy within one year
